TimeOffset.description: If offset is not found otherwise, use this as offset  for all log data

LogDataTables.description: Define log files to consolidate with image data. If more then one defined, they will be joined and missing values will be interpolated.

items.description: One log data table is one set of logfiles with identical collumn definitions.

TimeOffset.description: If offset is not found otherwise, use this as offset.

FirstImageCorrelation.description: Find offset for all log data by correlating first image with first entry of this table.

ZeroImageCorrelation.description: Find offset for all log data by correlating zero.tif with first entry of this table.

Name.description: Name field to be used as prefix in the joined collumn names.

Files.description: One log table may be one file, or a list of files to be concatenated.

RemotePath.description: Path of logfile on server if used in server mode.

LocalPath.description: Path of logfile on client. Overrides :ref:`RemotePath`.

OutputFormats.description: List of outputformats to write the consolidated log or the consolidated 'hdf' file.

HDFOptions.description: Options only relevant to hdf export.

IncludeCHI.description: Whether to include the .chi files as strings.

IncludeTIF.description: Whether to include the images as integer array.
